articles.description: The singer, 39, revealed her baby girl will have to stay the night as she described the situation as being 'bloody sad'. She kept her fans in the loop as she shared a picture from hospital on Friday morning.
articles.content:
Paloma Faith has rushed her six-week-old daughter to hospital with an infection.

articles.author: Helen Kelly
articles.title: 'GMB is finished without Piers' Viewers switch off as Charlotte and Alex host GMB - Express
articles.description: GOOD MORNING BRITAIN viewers claimed they were 'switching over' to BBC Breakfast as Charlotte Hawkins and Alex Beresford presented the bank holiday instalment.

articles.author: Carly Johnson
articles.title: Demi Lovato reenacts near-fatal 2018 overdose in music video for Dancing With The Devil - Daily Mail
articles.description: Demi Lovato's emotionally-charged music video for her latest single Dancing With The Devil premiered  on Thursday evening via YouTube.
articles.content:
Demi Lovato recreated the night of her 2018 overdose in the powerful music video for her single Dancing With The Devil.
